A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Extremely disappointing. Since The Force Awakens\, I had been so looking forward to this movie. They had such a great opportunity with this movie but instead they absolutely ruined it. There are so many things wrong with this movie I couldn't even begin to list them all. All I can say is it's been a week since I've seen it and I still feel let down and disappointed. I no longer have any desire to watch another Star Wars movie.
